## FLOStakeChange type

Represents the change between two states of an FLO Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FLOStakeChange<T> = {
    stakeFLO: T;
    unstakeFLO?: undefined;
} | {
    stakeFLO?: undefined;
    unstakeFLO: T;
    unstakeAllFLO: boolean;
};
```
